channel.title: MerlinScape - HD 508 Re-released! Lots of bug fixes: 32bit and 64bit client
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/logo.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size]
I released MerlinScape [HD 508] a while back, but with all the bugs and crashes people were having I removed the thread. Now that I have had time to fix some of the errors I have released it again. I hope you all enjoy! I used the DemonWars Client and Server which was Palidino76 source; so most credits to them.
[b]Btw --[/b] I have left you a task…. There is a crashing problem you need to fix it! - Also forgot to change the spawning area! (You wil NEED to change this)
[size=18pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] ~New and Imporved Help Commands (Teleports to help desk) ~New and Improved Jail Commands. (Teles to Camelot Jail) ~Normal Home (Edgeville) ~NPC vs NPC Combat (Npc’s attack eachother) ~High Def Client (562 looking graphics) ~Organized Server Files ~Random Server Messages ~Editable Quest Tab (Customizable) ~Hell of a lot more!
[size=18pt][b]Skill Completion:[/b][/size]
All Combat Skills are 100% **Mage is 95% **Range is 76%
------------------------------------------------------
[size=18pt][b]Non- Combat Skills:[/b][/size]
Fletching 100% Cooking 100% Fishing 100% etc….. Construction is 0%!!! (didn't feel like adding)
[size=18pt][b]Media[/b][/size] [b]I will post new ones soon, these are very outdated[/b]
[img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot2.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot3.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot4.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot5.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot6.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot7.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot8.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]Downloads:[/b][/size] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/29295440/MerlinScape%20%5BHD%5D%20Client%20and%20Server%20Package.rar]This is on my dropbox[/url]
(Has Server, 64bit Client, and 32bit client)
I have left you a task…. There is a crashing problem you need to fix it! - Also forgot to change the spawning area! (You wil NEED to change this) [/center]

item.title: MerlinScape - HD 508 Re-released! Lots of bug fixes: 32bit and 64bit client
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:6, topic:443705”][quote author=xEthanx link=topic=546382.msg4005851#msg4005851 date=1338626127]
This looks really nice, I prefer the 317 and this 508 HD… but holy hell a 241mb client? You may want to look to compress that size a bit somehow, I know it’s HD and all, but there are ways to make it smaller.
[/quote]I believe it contains two clients; 64bit and 32bit.[/quote]

Yup…

[quote=“nickog15, post:7, topic:443705”]Good job.
Might play around with it;).[/quote]

Have Fun

Read full topic

item.title: MerlinScape - HD 508 Re-released! Lots of bug fixes: 32bit and 64bit client
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:2, topic:443705”]So fucking amazing. I’m so happy these 508’s are coming back! RuneWings is creating the #1 508 though

Lol anyways, nice job, love the HD[/quote]

Thanks I probably should have re-posted on the old topic, but people would start gravedigging…

I am going to come out with a v2 soon, I just need to fix and add more stuff

Read full topic
